Plot: Pirena, Amihan, Alena and Danaya, the four princesses of Lireo vie for the title of Queen. When The Queen doesn't acknowledge Pirena's victory over the crown, she goes to the Hathors, the enemy kingdom and danger stirs over Encantadia.
Title: Encantadia
Actors: Richard Gomez, Dawn Zulueta, Sunshine Dizon, Iza Calzado
